officialTitle: Comparison of Early and Late Administration of Doxycycline in Their Efficacy Against Mansonella Perstans and in Development of Immunity Against Mycobacterial Infections
inclusionCriteria:
M. perstans mg-positive status Good general health without any clinical condition requiring long-term medication.

Normal renal and hepatic laboratory profiles
* Must have minimum age of 9 Years
* Must have maximum age of 55 Years
exclusionCriteria: Known intolerance to the doxycycline Body weight \<40 kg Pregnancy or breastfeeding History of severe allergic reaction or anaphylaxis Alcohol or drug abuse
